alert.note: Alert for Northeast Bighorn Mountains; Sheridan Foothills (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued October 25 at 8:06AM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...FREEZING DRIZZLE WILL AFFECT SHERIDAN COUNTY... At 801 AM MDT, freezing drizzle was being reported in Sheridan county, including the Sheridan Airport. So far road temperatures remain above freezing and road conditions are reported as wet, with ice accumulating on elevated surfaces such as vehicles. However, over the next few hours roads may become slick as surface temperatures continue to cool down. Locations impacted include... Sheridan, Ranchester, Dayton, Big Horn, Clearmont, Leiter, Arvada, Parkman, Banner, and Story. This includes portions of I-90 in Sheridan county. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for roads to be icy in spots. Please use extreme caution, especially on bridges, overpasses and around curves. Allow plenty of stopping distance and avoid braking suddenly. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling. If conditions worsen, a Winter Weather Advisory may become necessary. Please monitor local media outlets and the National Weather Service for further statements.
